feature_model.name: eshop
feature_model.feature_tree: :r eshop (f_eshop) :m catalogue (f_catalogue) :m payment (f_payment) :m security (f_security) :o search (f_search) :g [1, *] : bing (f_bing) : yahoo (f_yahoo) : google (f_google) :g [1, *] : transfer (f_transfer) : cc (f_cc) :g [1, 1] : high (f_high) : standard (f_standard)
